评论概述: Great for the price, perfect date night dress
评论详情: This dress fits like a glove! I ordered a medium which was true to size for me. I will need a little help getting the zipper all the way up but had no issues getting it past the seams like most dresses with zippers. I love it in red, perfect for Vday. The only reason I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 is that the threading was left out, I’ll cut it myself not big deal. However, for something so simple to be left undone it’s a reflection of the time spent finishing it. Other than that, no complaints. It has thick material, fits very well and the length is perfect to keep it classy but sexy.

I ordered this dress for NYE. I am mostly a conservative dresser, so I like that this dress had a sexy edge but still mostly covers everything up and leaves things to the imagination. My two least favorite parts were it dipped pretty low, so lots of cleavage even for those of us not trying to show any (I'm top heavy, DDD fyi) and second, the zipper in the back could've been of better quality. Overall, great dress and I would get again in a different color in the future.

The dress was almost perfect, except the chest area is too loose and this is coming from someone who has typically has issues finding the right material due to a big chest. The lower half is very form fitting and you almost don’t need a spandex underneath.
